maqras.text: (This is) a chapter which We sent it down and We made it mandatory and We sent down clear verses in it, so that you may take notice

Flog each one of the adulterer/fornicator man and the adulterer/fornicator woman one hundred lashes, and do not let pity for them takes you away from God’s law if you believe in God and the last day, and a group of the believers should witness their punishment

The adulterer/fornicator man should only marry an adulterer/fornicator or a polytheist woman, and the adulterer/fornicator woman should only get married to an adulterer/fornicator or a polytheist man, and that is forbidden to the believers
And those who accuse chaste women, then do not bring four witnesses, then flog them eighty lashes and do not ever accept their testimony, and they are the disobedient ones
Except those who repent and straighten out after that, then indeed God is forgiving and merciful

And those who accuse their spouses, and there is no witnesses for them except themselves, then their individual testimony (is acceptable) if they testify four times (swearing) by God that he is certainly of the truthful ones
And the fifth (oath) that God’s curse be on him if he is of the liars
And it prevents the punishment from her if she testifies four times (swearing) by God that indeed he is of the liars
And the fifth (oath) that God’s anger be on her if he is of the truthful ones
And if it was not for God’s grace and mercy on you (you would be in trouble). God is acceptor of repentance and wise

Those who brought the lie (and accusation) were a bunch of you. Do not think that it is bad for you, but it is good for you. For every one of them earned a share of the sin, and the one among them who had greatest (share) of it, has a great punishment
Why when you heard it, the believing men and the believing women did not think well of themselves and they did not say: this is an obvious lie
Why did they not bring four witnesses for it? So when they did not bring the witnesses, then they are the liars in God’s view
And if it was not for God’s grace and mercy on you in this world and in the hereafter, a great punishment would have touched you because of what you engaged in it
When you receive it through each other’s tongues and you say with your mouths what you have no knowledge of it, and you think it is insignificant, while it is significant in God's view
And whey when you heard it, you did not say: it is not for us to speak of this, You are flawless, this is a great slander
God advises you that do not ever repeat anything like it if you are believers
And God clarifies the signs for you, and God is knowledgeable and wise
Indeed those who like to spread the indecency among those who believed have a painful punishment in this world and the hereafter, and God knows and you do not know
And if it was not for God’s grace and mercy on you, (you would be in trouble) and indeed God is gentle and merciful
